article_title: The 15 Highest-Paid Coaches in College Football
article_text:
15) Steve Spurrier

University of South Carolina Gamecocks

Salary: $4 million

Before resigning in October, midway through his 11th season at South Carolina, Spurrier was the highest-paid public employee in the Palmetto State.
